```{r, echo = FALSE}
library(rvest)
library(jsonlite)
downloads_from_conda = function(pkg, where, channel) {
	if(where == "cran") {
		oe = try(x <- read_html(paste0("https://anaconda.org/", channel, "/r-", tolower(pkg), "/badges/downloads.svg")), silent = TRUE)
	} else {
		oe = try(x <- read_html(paste0("https://anaconda.org/", channel, "/bioconductor-", tolower(pkg), "/badges/downloads.svg")), silent = TRUE)
	}
	if(inherits(oe, "try-error")) {
		return(0)
	}
	txt = html_nodes(x, "title") |> html_text()
	txt = gsub("^downloads: ", "", txt)
	txt = gsub(" total", "", txt)
	unit = tolower(substr(txt, nchar(txt), nchar(txt)))
	num = as.numeric(gsub("\\w$", "", txt))
	if(is.na(num)) {
		return(0)
	}
	if(unit == "k") {
		num = num*1024
	} else if(unit == "m") {
		num = num*1024*1024
	}
	return(num)
}
downloads_from_cran = function(pkg) {
	x = read_json(paste0("https://cranlogs.r-pkg.org/downloads/total/2001-01-01:2114-01-01/", pkg))
	x[[1]]$downloads
}
downloads_from_bioc = function(pkg, bioc_anno = FALSE) {
	if(bioc_anno) {
		df = read.table(paste0("http://bioconductor.org/packages/stats/data-annotation/", pkg, "/", pkg, "_stats.tab"), header = TRUE)
	} else {
		df = read.table(paste0("http://bioconductor.org/packages/stats/bioc/", pkg, "/", pkg, "_stats.tab"), header = TRUE)
	}
	sum(df[df[, "Month"] != "all", "Nb_of_downloads"])
}

format_dn = function(s) {
	if(s > 1000000) {
		s = paste0(round(s/1000000, 1), "M")
	} else if(s > 1000) {
		s = paste0(round(s/1000, 1), "K")
	} else {
		s = as.character(s)
	}
	s
}
dn = function(pkg, cran = FALSE, bioc_anno = FALSE) {
	s = 0
	if(cran) {
		s = downloads_from_cran(pkg)
		s = s + downloads_from_conda(pkg, "cran", "conda-forge")
		s = s + downloads_from_conda(pkg, "cran", "bioconda")
	} else {
		s = downloads_from_bioc(pkg, bioc_anno = bioc_anno)
		s = s + downloads_from_conda(pkg, "bioc", "bioconda")
	}
	
	s
}
```


```{r, echo = FALSE}
all_pkgs = read.table(textConnection(
"ComplexHeatmap    bioc
InteractiveComplexHeatmap    bioc
EnrichedHeatmap    bioc
HilbertCurve    bioc
gtrellis    bioc
circlize    cran
spiralize    cran
gtrellis    bioc
BioCartaImage    bioc
sfcurve    cran
simona    bioc
simplifyEnrichment    bioc
cola    bioc
rGREAT    bioc
CePa    cran
GeneSummary    bioc_anno
UniProtKeywords    bioc_anno
BioMartGOGeneSets    bioc_anno
IlluminaHumanMethylationEPICv2anno.20a1.hg38    bioc_anno
IlluminaHumanMethylationEPICv2manifest    bioc_anno
pkgndep    cran
bsub    cran
GetoptLong    cran
GlobalOptions    cran
"))

total_downloads = 0
for(i in seq_len(nrow(all_pkgs))) {
	if(all_pkgs[i, 2] == "cran") {
		total_downloads = total_downloads + dn(all_pkgs[i, 1], cran = TRUE)
	} else if(all_pkgs[i, 2] == "bioc") {
		total_downloads = total_downloads + dn(all_pkgs[i, 1], cran = FALSE, bioc_anno = FALSE)
	} else if(all_pkgs[i, 2] == "bioc_anno") {
		total_downloads = total_downloads + dn(all_pkgs[i, 1], cran = FALSE, bioc_anno = TRUE)
	}
}

ln = readLines("downloads.txt")
ln = c(ln, paste0(as.character(Sys.Date()), "\t", total_downloads))
ln = unique(ln)
writeLines(ln, "downloads.txt")
```

主要使用R语言编写。软件包总下载量约为<strong>`r format_dn(total_downloads)`</strong>，数据来自于[CRAN](https://cranlogs.r-pkg.org) / [Bioconductor](https://bioconductor.org/packages/stats/index.html) / [Anaconda](https://anaconda.org/)，更新于`r Sys.Date()`。

```{r, echo = FALSE}
format_dn_cran = function(pkg) {
	format_dn(dn(pkg, cran = TRUE))
}
format_dn_bioc = function(pkg) {
	format_dn(dn(pkg, cran = FALSE, bioc_anno = FALSE))
}
format_dn_bioc_anno = function(pkg) {
	format_dn(dn(pkg, cran = FALSE, bioc_anno = TRUE))
}
```

```{r, echo = FALSE}
cran_status = function(pkg) {
	html = read_html(paste0("https://cran.r-project.org/web/checks/check_results_", pkg, ".html"))
	status = unique(html_table(html_element(html, "table"))$Status)
	if("ERROR" %in% status) {
		return("ERROR")
	} else if("WARN" %in% status) {
		return("WARN")
	} else if("NOTE" %in% status) {
		return("NOTE")
	} else {
		return("OK")
	}
}
cran_check_shield = function(status) {
	if(status == "ERROR") {
		"https://img.shields.io/badge/check-ERROR-red"
	} else if(status == "WARN") {
		"https://img.shields.io/badge/check-WARN-orange"
	} else if(status == "NOTE") {
		"https://img.shields.io/badge/check-NOTE-F7A845"
	} else {
		"https://img.shields.io/badge/check-OK-green"
	}
}
```
